overview: They startled the video world with their blockbuster sensations, "Jamie Loves Jeff", one of adult's all-time major releases. Now they're back. And they're ready for each other, in the reunion they both wanted. And both wanted on film. Vivid proudly presents Jamie Loves Jeff 2. The video that proves you can go home again. And if you're Jeff Stryker and Jamie Summers, you just may burn down the house.
tagline: Absence makes the hot grow hotter.
title: Jamie Loves Jeff 2
